entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Powell River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:39 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Powell River Airport 03:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023

Humidity: 52 %

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 8.

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 1.
